column4: Hello. I am currently dual booting ubuntu (latest version+patched) and windows xp professional (all latest security patches, firewall etc...) If my windows install gets compromised will that mean that my ubuntu install is also compromised?
no...the linux partition should be safe enough
if your ubuntu install resides on an ntfs partition it won't be safe
part of the protection in linux is that windows can't write to the ext partition.
